name: SUPER NATURE TRACKER
description:
THE MYSTIC FOREST HAS BEEN AMBUSHED BY AND EVIL FORCE! SCATTERING THE POWER ORBS THAT POWER THE FOREST ALL OVER THE PLACE! YOU MUST SAVE THE FOREST BEFORE ITS TOO LATE!

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD
ARROW KEYS TO MOVE 
Z TO RUN AND X TO JUMP!

CONTROLLER
JOYSTICK OR DPAD TO MOVE
B TO RUN AND A TO JUMP


DISCLAIMER: I WASN'T ABLE TO USE ALL 10 DAYS FROM THIS JAM DUE TO ME BEING BUSY WITH OTHER THINGS.
